sources.title: Fighting to Live
sources.description: When attacked by two dogs, Joe Gilmore (Eddie Phillips) leaves them on the desert to die. Later one of the dogs saves John Blake from drowning. Men arrive claiming the dog is killing their chickens. They want to kill the dog but John convinces them the dog's fate should be determined by a trial.

sources.title: Fighting to Live (1934) REB RUSSELL
sources.description:
Stars: Reb Russell, Marion Shilling, Steve Pendleton
Director: Eddie Cline

Abandoned in the desert, courageous German Shepherd Captain manages to make his way back to town, where the starving dog raids chicken coops to survive. He also saves young lawyer John Blake from drowning. A group of irate farmers capture the canine chicken thief, intent on destroying him. Lawyer Blake intervenes and demands that the noble animal be granted a trial.

metadata.Plot: When attacked by two dogs, Joe Gilmore leaves them on the desert to die. Later one of the dogs saves John Blake from drowning. Men arrive claiming the dog is killing their chickens. They want to kill the dog but John convinces them the dog's fate should be determined by a trial.
metadata.Actors: Marion Shilling, Steve Pendleton, Reb Russell
